title: T206 graded tough commons for sale

posts.post_title: T206 graded tough commons for sale
posts.post_content:
Conroy Fielding SGC 3 $175
Lobert PSA 2.5 $190

Shipping $5 per card.  Paypal F&F 

Interesting thought about the Lobert. At the recent large annual Boston show, I saw and sifted through well over 1000 T206s. Not one Lobert in the entire house.
